price: 52. Ce sont eux qu’Allah a maudits ; et celui qu’Allah maudit, jamais tu ne lui trouveras de soutien et d’allié.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَمَن يَلۡعَنِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ نَصِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna laʿanahumu al-lahu waman yalʿani al-lahu falan tajida lahu naṣīran
